about.details:
Incorporated in 2017, Ahasolar Technologies Limited is engaged in the business of CleanTech enabling Energy Transition through Digital Transformation and henceforth empowering stakeholders to adopt renewable energy.

With their passion for solar energy and the desire to help stakeholders like solar companies and the government change the world for the better, Ahasolar is making the process of managing, selling, designing, and procuring solar PV systems easier and simpler.

The business of the company can be divided into the following segments:

  • Solar Software Service
  • Solar Marketplace
  • Solar Advisory and Consultancy Service

The entity has been working with multiple national, international, government, and private companies towards enabling them to accelerate the adoption of solar through solutions offered by Ahasolar. Ahasolar Technologies Limited is also involved in the business of Advisory for sustainable development and energy transition to renewables.

The products of Ahasolar Technologies are offered under the names:

  • AHA! Rooftop Solar Helper
  • AHA! Rooftop Solar Helper (Pro)

faqs.question: What is the Ahasolar Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Ahasolar Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 818400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.85 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹157 per share. The minimum order quantity is 800.

The IPO opens on July 10, 2023, and closes on July 13, 2023.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Ahasolar Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Ahasolar Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Ahasolar Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Ahasolar Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Ahasolar Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Ahasolar Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Ahasolar Technologies IPO opens on July 10, 2023 and closes on July 13, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Ahasolar Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Ahasolar Technologies IPO lot size is 800, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,25,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for Ahasolar Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Ahasolar Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Ahasolar Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Ahasolar Technologies IPO will be done on Tuesday, July 18, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, July 20, 2023. Check the Ahasolar Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Ahasolar Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Ahasolar Technologies IPO listing date is on Friday, July 21, 2023.
